attributes.action: Allow 16 & 17 year olds to buy Non Alcoholic beer & wine.
attributes.additional_details: It is very suprising being ID'd while trying to buy Non Alcoholic Beer. The amount of alcohol in these drinks is so little that no matter how much you drink you will never be effected atall. I do think that all 16 & 17 year olds in the UK should be allowed to purchase these products just like they are purchasing soft drinks like cola.
